sectionTitle: The origins of our trusted partner network
intro:
Bird was born from the meeting of former consultants convinced that there is another way to support organizations.
We offer tailored and accessible guidance, bridging the gap between the structured expertise of consulting firms and the flexibility of an independent consultant.
philosophy: Our approach does not question the value of traditional consulting firms. It aims to fill a gap: enabling organizations that may not always have the resources, especially in the current economic climate, to also benefit from high-level strategic and financial support.

seydina.name: Seydina Samb
description: Specialist in complex situations and companies requiring financial, strategic, and operational structuring or restructuring.
Throughout his career, he has demonstrated resilience, agility, and creativity, particularly in complex transactional processes.
His passion for music and cinema, two demanding fields, reflects a curious and structured mind with a keen eye for detail.
seydina.diploma: Graduate of IESEG School Of Management

benjamin.name: Benjamin Le Gal
description: Expert in assisting companies and funds with their M&A processes, including Due Diligence and buyer searches.
He also brings solid experience in CFO roles at startups and mid-sized companies, where he supported fundraising efforts.
A former semi-professional footballer, he is still guided by discipline, strategy, and commitment.
benjamin.diploma: Graduate of IESEG School Of Management
